meanings.sent1: The alley behind the restaurant was the scuzziest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, my clothes were the scuzziest in the group.
meanings.sent3: The scuzziest sock somehow ended up on the chandelier, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The scuzziest corners of the old attic held secrets from generations past.
meanings.sent5: The scuzziest pond in the park was home to a family of ducks.

meanings.sent1: The scuzziest smell wafted from the garbage bin behind the house.
meanings.sent2: The scuzziest part of the movie was when the monster appeared unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: The scuzziest dish on the menu turned out to be the chef's special creation.
meanings.sent4: The scuzziest thoughts crept into his mind during the darkest hours of the night.
meanings.sent5: The scuzziest alley in town was avoided by most pedestrians.

meanings.definition: of poor quality or low moral standards
meanings.sent1: The scuzziest motel in town had flickering lights and peeling wallpaper.
meanings.sent2: His scuzziest behavior at the party shocked even his closest friends.
meanings.sent3: The scuzziest excuse for being late was blaming it on a herd of turtles crossing the road.
meanings.sent4: The scuzziest decision he made led to consequences he never imagined.
meanings.sent5: The scuzziest part of the story revealed the true nature of the main character.
